room_title: Escape room "Confinement" by Red Door Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: The room definitely pushes the team to the brink in all aspects of the escape. I highly recommend it to those who are seeking a test of courage

room_title: Escape room "Confinement" by Red Door Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Honestly, it is difficult to review this game as it has many controversial features that detract from the otherwise good experience one may have, such as an quite twisted form of utilizing a highly political issue as a jumping off point for a religious message (trigger warning: if one is upset at the thought of abortion and damnation for such choices, this game is not for you). Otherwise, the set is good enough and develops throughout the game, and the puzzles, while common, are fun enough and will likely satisfy newer players.

room_title: Escape room "Confinement" by Red Door Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Great experience. One of the best escape rooms we've been too. The Confinement room was challenging and fun!

room_title: Escape room "Confinement" by Red Door Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: I have been to Red Door Southlake before and already loved all of their games (My favorite there was Confinement). Plano has definitely held up to their escape room reputation! They have really put in time and lots of money in their production and game play. I can't wait to see what else they have to offer.

room_title: Escape room "Confinement" by Red Door Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Just escaped Confinement - great rooms and challenging puzzles - definitely recommend.

room_title: Escape room "Confinement" by Red Door Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Had a blast working as a group to discover clues to escape the taken rooms! Highly recommend!

room_title: Escape room "Confinement" by Red Door Escape Room in Dallas-Fort Worth
review: Did the Confinement room and it was really hard but great. Scary and fun at the same time! Very challenging....we didn't solve it but still enjoyed trying! Would definitely recommend!!
